name: Time Gal HD Remaster
storyline: The game is set in a fictional future where time travel is possible. The protagonist, Reika, travels to different time periods in search of a criminal, Luda, from her time. After successfully tracking down Luda, Reika prevents his plans to alter the past.
summary:
An HD remaster of an action game in which Reika, the ace of the historical security police, goes back in time and tracks down the future great villain Luda, who stole a time machine and fled to the past.

Apart of the Taito LD Game Collection.
